params.context: Contains the latestBlock when skip was requested, and the requestedBlock to skip to.
Contains the latest block when step was requested.

requestHeaderSkip(uint64).details: Skip proof is valid if at least 1/3 of the voting power signed on requestedBlock is from validators in the validator set for latestBlock. Request will fail if the requested block is more than SKIP_MAX blocks ahead of the latest block. Pass both the latest block and the requested block as context, as the latest block may change before the request is fulfilled.

requestHeaderStep().details: Only used if 2/3 of voting power in a validator set changes in one block.

SKIP_MAX().notice: The maximum number of blocks that can be skipped in a single request.

blockHeightToHeaderHash(uint64).notice: Maps block heights to their header hashes.

callbackHeaderSkip(bytes,bytes).notice: Stores the new header for requestedBlock.

callbackHeaderStep(bytes,bytes).notice: Stores the new header for latestBlock + 1.

constructor.notice: Initialize the contract with the address of the gateway contract.

functionNameToId(string).notice: Maps function names to their IDs.

gateway().notice: The address of the gateway contract.

latestBlock().notice: The latest block that has been committed.

requestHeaderSkip(uint64).notice: Prove the validity of the header at requested block.

requestHeaderStep().notice: Prove the validity of the header at latestBlock + 1.

setGenesisHeader(uint64,bytes32).notice: Note: Only for testnet. The genesis header should be set when initializing the contract.

updateFunctionId(string,bytes32).notice: Update the function ID for a function name.

updateGateway(address).notice: Update the address of the gateway contract.
